attributes.review: I opened this and I swear my phone instantly shut down. I had to go into Apple to get the app manually deleted because my phone refused to come back on. Nothing good comes from this app !!!

attributes.review: I opened the app and immediately felt nauseous. Iâ€™m not one to shame, but seeing Donald Trump was not it.
